attributes.action: Turn Fen Park Primary School in Lowestoft Suffolk into a activity centre
attributes.additional_details: The Suffolk county council has told us that the old Primary School needs to be taken of the register which is down to the Secretary of State for education. Your vote will give the community an opportunity to help children and the elderly overcome health issues and seclusion
attributes.background: Suffolk county council want to turn the Fen Park Primary School into an adult Behaveral centre with an outsourced charity. The EAMMAA charity wants to turn this into a community activities centre for it's community children, young adults, the elderly and the disabled and give job opportunities

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you'd like the Government to take. This seems to be the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:

https://www.suffolk.gov.uk/council-and-democracy/consultations-petitions-and-elections/starting-a-petition/
